notes.text:
• Foundry is finally ready for 0.8.x
  • Characters can now be migrated! Automatically get updated features from spells and abilities
  • Containers can now be used
  • Equipment can now be enchanted to create Artifacts!
  • The new token bar next to the hotbar helps you find quick access to skills (we will update skill icons soon too)
  • Abilities can now be connected to sounds. Let your players hear the their enemies steal rattling down on their heads!
  • Aventurian Magic 2, Aventurian Bestiary 2 and the Drachenritter campaign are now available
  • English core rules module available in the US store
  • And big thanks to all our voluntary helpers!

• The combat system received some improvements during the development of the compendium 1.
  • The new game master's menu should make the GMs life easier.
  • VTTom created a new channel with changelog information and tutorials.
  • Niemand also started a new channel with let's plays and tutorials.
  • Compendium 1 and Mittsommerrache are available soon in german.
  • Aventurian Armory and Bestiary are soon available in the US store in english.
  • And big thanks again to all our voluntary helpers!

• The library provides better performance and filtering options.
  • The journalbrowser has been updated with better search functions and the possibility to pin entries.
  • VTTom has a lot of new new Tutorials.
  • Niemand also started a new channel with let's plays and tutorials.
  • Aventurian Pandemonium and Aventurian Companions are available soon.
  • Aventurian Armory and Bestiary are available in the US store in english.
  • And big thanks again to all our voluntary helpers!

• You can now create Active Effect Containers.
  • Weapons can be poisoned.
  • Group fate points can now be used.
  • VTTom has again plenty of new Tutorials.
  • Aventurian Pandemonium II, Gods of Aventuria II and the first chapter of the "Rabenkrieg" campaign are available soon.
  • Aventurian Armory and Bestiary are available in the US store in english.
  • And big thanks again to all our voluntary helpers! Especially Gunthgard, VTTom, Niemand and Mckee.

• NPC Generators
  • Armor location hitzones
  • Creature dependend modifiers
  • Magical and blessed weapons
  • Ammunition types
  • VTTom has again plenty of new Tutorials.
  • Master's Workshop and Aventurian Armory 2 are available soon
  • The Master's Workshop is available in the US store in english soon.
  • And big thanks again to all our voluntary helpers! Especially Gunthgard, VTTom, Nellkir, Niemand and Mckee.

• TDE for Foundry 9 Beta soon
  • Character calculator
  • VTTom has again plenty of new Tutorials.
  • The Suncoast & Labyrinth of Intrigues soon available
  • The module Aventurian Magic I is available in the US store in english soon.
  • And big thanks again to all our voluntary helpers! Especially Gunthgard, VTTom, Nellkir, Niemand, Lambert and Mckee.

• Foundry 9 finished with new features
  • Improved performance for maps with many walls and lights
  • Card decks
  • Keybinds
  • ...and TDE is ready for v9!

• Foundry 9 module adjustments
  • The new player menu now harbors its first function - Summoning
  • The core module light macro has been vastly improved (please replace the old one)
  • Aventurian Necromantheum (German) soon
  • Rabenkrieg II (German) soon
  • Aventurian Gods (English) available
  • And don't forget to visit VTTom's Youtube channel for recent tutorial videos (german, some with subtitle)
  • And big thanks again to all our voluntary helpers! Especially Gunthgard, VTTom, Nellkir, Niemand, Lambert and Mckee.

• On-Use-Effects for abilities and items (included in the next premium module updates)
  • Core module - improved light macro
  • Disease tracking
  • Automated Animations support
  • Dere Positioning System
  • Aventurian Magic III (German) soon
  • Rabenkrieg II (German) soon
  • Aventurian Compendium (English) soon
  • And don't forget to visit VTTom's Youtube channel for recent tutorial videos (german, some with subtitle)
  • And big thanks again to all our voluntary helpers! Especially Gunthgard, VTTom, Nellkir, Niemand, Lambert, Adalariel and Mckee.

• More on use effects.
  • Tokenhotbar v2
  • Aventuria Compendium II (German) soon
  • And don't forget to visit VTTom's Youtube channel for recent tutorial videos (german, some with subtitle)
  • And big thanks again to all our voluntary helpers! Especially Gunthgard, VTTom, Nellkir, Niemand, Lambert, Adalariel and Mckee.

• More on use effects.
  • Merchant v2
  • TDE initiative tracker
  • Aventurian Transmutarium (German) soon
  • And don't forget to visit VTTom's Youtube channel for recent tutorial videos (german, some with subtitle)
  • And big thanks again to all our voluntary helpers! Especially Gunthgard, VTTom, Nellkir, Lambert, Adalariel, Mckee and in memoriam Niemand.

• Final TDE release for Foundry v9
  • Aventurian Herbarium (German), Aventurian Taverns (German) and Orcs supplement (German) soon
  • And don't forget to visit VTTom's Youtube channel for recent tutorial videos (german, some with subtitle)
  • And big thanks again to all our voluntary helpers! Especially Gunthgard, VTTom, Nellkir, Lambert, Adalariel, Mckee and in memoriam Niemand.

• Foundry v10 & TDE are ready
  • New item "information"
  • New active effect options
  • Plenty of fixes and improvements
  • And don't forget to visit VTTom's Youtube channel for recent tutorial videos (german, some with subtitle)
  • And big thanks again to all our voluntary helpers! Especially Gunthgard, VTTom, Nellkir, Lambert, Adalariel, Mckee and in memoriam Niemand.

• Spellextensions functional
  • Info item for plants & journals
  • Obfuscate items
  • A bunch of new german modules soon (Rabenkrieg 3, Elementarium, Verhandlungskunst und Friedensschwur).
  • And don't forget to visit VTTom's Youtube channel for recent tutorial videos (german, some with subtitle)
  • And big thanks again to all our voluntary helpers! Especially Gunthgard, VTTom, Nellkir, Lambert, Adalariel, Mckee and in memoriam Niemand.
